deprecated: DeprecationWarning: watson-developer-cloud moved to ibm-watson. To get updates, use the new package.
description: Client library to use the IBM Watson Services
name: watson-developer-cloud

scripts.build: tsc && npm run browserify && npm run minify
scripts.lint: npm run eslint:check && npm run tslint:check && dependency-lint
scripts.watch-doc: nodemon --watch ./ --ext js,tmpl,json --ignore dist/ --ignore doc/ --ignore test/ --ignore examples/ --exec npm run doc
